message: Hi Bob! I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both need to reach an agreement, and you can counter if you disagree.

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm proposing a fair 50-50 split, which gives us both equal shares. Since I face a 5% inflation penalty each round, quick agreement benefits me, but I still think an even split is most fair for both of us.
